 HE DID ALTER MY POLL ABOUT WHETHER OR NOT HE HAS A RIGHT TO DELETE 
OTHER PEAOPLES POLLS! I DID NOT ADD IN THAT PART ABOUT IF THEY ARE 
OFFENSIVE TO ANYONE! HE SHOULD HAVE SIMPLE DELETED IT(proving my 
point in the process ironically)!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ooC message after IC text. Dewboy read it, please.
> 
> --- Lynxiz / Lokk / Axis ---
> 
> Axis brightens as he spies Windlord. "There he is, right over 
there. 
> See?" Having helped Lynxiz, Axis turns to talk to Seekker, 
> snorting in disagreement with his assessment of the battle. "Bah, 
> you did almost nothing, and when you acctually did that 
> something, it hurt US more than THEM. Hehe," Axis laughs once, 
> then shakes his head.
> 
> Lynxiz smiles as she spots Windlord as well. Nodding to Axis, the 
> thanks him, and proceeds to make her way between missile 
> craters and other obstacles on the battle charred ground in front 
of 
> the Chivitron base. Heading towards Windlord, she waves to try to 
> get his attention.
> 
> Lokk stops and turns slightly to regard Grounded, his face grimly 
> showing agreement. "Yeah... that will be ugly... ugly be 
> necessary." He keeps heading back to the base, his path taking 
> him towards Windlord.
> 
> 
> OOC: Dewboy, your poll (the one below) needs to be altered. First 
> off, Zardus doesn't alter or delete biased polls that aren't 
offensive. 
> Secondly, he doesn't alter, and hasn't altered, biased polls so 
they 
> represent the opposite bias (though i believe that it depends on 
> who's point of view you are coming from.). If the poll isn't 
offensive, 
> then Zardus most likely won't delete it. 
> 
> Next thing. Did you read all of my post entitled "Dewboy" (post # 
> 41061)? If so, I will ask you again, did you read all of my post 
> entitled "Dewboy" (post # 41061)? If you still answer Yes, then I 
> will ask you for the last time, did you read all of my post 
entitled 
> "Dewboy" (post # 41061)? Since you posted for your characters 
> finding the Rocak ship, the answer to my question is obviously no. 
> Now you're going to have to hold (this time, don't actually post) 
> your posts regarding the Rocak ship. Then you must send the 
> council a detailed list of weapons, capabilities, size and 
capacity. 
> Ok? =)
> 
> Last thing... Ok, I'm done for now, until I think of something else 
to 
> say. =P
>

>
